column4: i have ubuntu-restricted-extrasinstaled how come i can't play mp3
someone pls
hello please
wazup?
i have installed ubuntu-restricted-extras, what now
are the apps not playing at all, or are you having audio issues?
which player? u have the medibuntu repository in ur apt?
how do i get medibuntu
use rhythmbox. if it's having problems (like codecs), you need to allow the download of codec driver
yes thats the exact problem - how do dl codec
no packages with the requested plugins found: mpeg-1 layer 3 mp3 decoder
dude! medi-frikkin-buntu! add it to ur repository & update
howwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu
if you go to www.medibuntu.org, click on "repository howto", it's all explained plain & simple
it doen't matter; once you've added the medibuntu repository, it's loaded as needed
have you actually done the effort of going to the site & following the guide?
the problem is not the OS, but the dodgy codecs your media's encoded in
oh yea, mp3 codecs are real dodgy

dude! please pay attention! people are taking time to help you out. go to www.medibuntu.org, click on the howto-link & add & update your repository. it's 3 click & a copy & paste. if you're not willing to do something so simple, then give me root ssh admin to you box & we'll fix it FOR you
i already told you five times that i did that and i keep asking "what's next" or rephrase it to "then whta?" and you obviously dont get that
you DO NOT need to explicitly add codecs; the medibuntu allows it to be dome automatically. you've been told this a few times now
then what?
